front.extra:
PRAYER:
Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India
for issuance of Writ of Certiorari, calling for the records pertaining to the
impugned order passed by the 1 st respondent in R.C.No.32348/ICI/2019, dated
30.09.2019 insofar as the petitioner is concerned and the consequential
impugned recovery order passed by the 3 rd respondent in R.C.No.758/A/2019,
dated 17.10.2019 and quash the same.
For Petitioner
:
